markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Prisons of the Inner Sea](/Articles.aspx?ID=31)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale](/Sources.aspx?ID=51) pg. 64

The Black Whale is only one of Golarion’s dark and terrible prisons. Explore infamous prisons of iron, stone, and magic from across the world!
